00040 #include "btkLowToHighImageResolutionMethod.h"
00041 #include "btkSliceBySliceRigidRegistration.h"
00042 #include "btkResampleImageByInjectionFilter.h"
00043 #include "itkNormalizedCorrelationImageToImageMetric.h"
00044 #include "itkLinearInterpolateImageFunction.h"
00045 #include "itkDivideByConstantImageFilter.h"
00046 #include "itkMinimumMaximumImageCalculator.h"
00047 
00048 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00049 #include "btkSliceBySliceTransform.h"
00050 #include "itkTransformFileWriter.h"
00051 #include "itkImage.h"
00052 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00053 
00054 #include "itkImageMaskSpatialObject.h"
00055 #include "btkImageIntersectionCalculator.h"
00056 
00057 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00058 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00059 
00060 #include <stdio.h>
00061 
00062 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00063 {
00064 
00065   try {
00066 
00067   std::vector< std::string > input;
00068   std::vector< std::string > mask;
00069   std::vector< std::string > transform;
00070   std::vector< std::string > roi;
00071   std::vector< std::string > resampled;
00072   unsigned int itMax;
00073   double epsilon;
00074   double margin;
00075 
00076   const char *outImage = NULL;
00077   const char *combinedMask = NULL;
00078 
00079   std::vector< int > x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2;
00080 
00081   // Parse arguments
00082 
00083   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Creates a high resolution image from a set of low "
00084       "resolution images", ' ', "Unversioned");
00085 
00086   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Image file",true,"string",cmd);
00087   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> maskArg("m","","Mask file",false,"string",cmd);
00088   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> transformArg("t","transform","Transform output "
00089       "file",false,"string",cmd);
00090   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> roiArg("","roi","roi file (written as mask)",false,
00091       "string",cmd);
00092   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> resampledArg("","ir","Resampled image with initial "
00093       "transform",false,"string",cmd);
00094   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outArg("o","output","High resolution image",true,
00095       "","string",cmd);
00096   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> combinedMaskArg("","combined-masks","All image "
00097       "masks combined in a single one",false,"","string",cmd);
00098   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> iterArg("n","iter","Maximum number of iterations"
00099       " (default 10)",false, 10,"unsigned int",cmd);
00100   TCLAP::ValueArg<double> epsilonArg("e","epsilon","Minimal percent change between "
00101       "two iterations considered as convergence. (default 0.0001)",false, 1e-4,
00102       "double",cmd);
00103 
00104   TCLAP::ValueArg<double> marginArg("","margin","Adds a margin to the reconstructed "
00105       "images to compensate for a small FOV in the reference. The value must be "
00106       "provided in millimeters (default 0).",false, 0.0,"double",cmd);
00107 
00108   TCLAP::SwitchArg  boxSwitchArg("","box","Use intersections for roi calculation",false);
00109   TCLAP::SwitchArg  maskSwitchArg("","mask","Use masks for roi calculation",false);
00110   TCLAP::SwitchArg  allSwitchArg("","all","Use the whole image FOV",false);
00111 
00112   TCLAP::SwitchArg  rigid3DSwitchArg("","3D","Use of 3D rigid transforms."
00113       " Recommended for adult subjects.", cmd, false);
00114 
00115   // xor arguments for roi assessment
00116 
00117   std::vector<TCLAP::Arg*>  xorlist;
00118   xorlist.push_back(&boxSwitchArg);
00119   xorlist.push_back(&maskSwitchArg);
00120   xorlist.push_back(&allSwitchArg);
00121 
00122   cmd.xorAdd( xorlist );
00123 
00124   // Parse the argv array.
00125   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00126 
00127   input = inputArg.getValue();
00128   mask = maskArg.getValue();
00129   outImage = outArg.getValue().c_str();
00130   combinedMask = combinedMaskArg.getValue().c_str();
00131   transform = transformArg.getValue();
00132   roi = roiArg.getValue();
00133   resampled = resampledArg.getValue();
00134   itMax = iterArg.getValue();
00135   epsilon = epsilonArg.getValue();
00136   margin = marginArg.getValue();
00137 
00138   bool rigid3D = rigid3DSwitchArg.getValue();
00139 
00140   // typedefs
00141 
00142   const    unsigned int    Dimension = 3;
00143   typedef  short           PixelType;
00144 
00145   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >  ImageType;
00146   typedef ImageType::Pointer                  ImagePointer;
00147 
00148   typedef ImageType::RegionType               RegionType;
00149   typedef std::vector< RegionType >           RegionArrayType;
00150 
00151   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType  >  ImageReaderType;
00152 
00153   typedef itk::Image< unsigned char, Dimension >    ImageMaskType;
00154   typedef ImageMaskType::Pointer                    ImageMaskPointer;
00155 
00156   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageMaskType >     MaskReaderType;
00157   typedef itk::ImageMaskSpatialObject< Dimension >  MaskType;
00158   typedef MaskType::Pointer  MaskPointer;
00159 
00160   typedef btk::LowToHighImageResolutionMethod<ImageType> LowToHighResFilterType;
00161   LowToHighResFilterType::Pointer lowToHighResFilter = LowToHighResFilterType::New();
00162 
00163   /* Registration type required in case of slice by slice transformations
00164   A rigid transformation is employed because there is not distortions like
00165   in diffusion imaging. We have performed a comparison of accuracy between
00166   both types of transformations. */
00167   typedef btk::SliceBySliceRigidRegistration<ImageType> RegistrationType;
00168   typedef RegistrationType::Pointer RegistrationPointer;
00169 
00170   // Registration type required in case of 3D affine trasforms
00171   typedef btk::RigidRegistration<ImageType> Rigid3DRegistrationType;
00172   typedef Rigid3DRegistrationType::Pointer Rigid3DRegistrationPointer;
00173 
00174   // Slice by slice transform definition (typically for in utero reconstructions)
00175   typedef btk::SliceBySliceTransform< double, Dimension > TransformType;
00176   typedef TransformType::Pointer                          TransformPointer;
00177 
00178   // Rigid 3D transform definition (typically for reconstructions in adults)
00179   typedef btk::Euler3DTransform< double > Rigid3DTransformType;
00180   typedef Rigid3DTransformType::Pointer   Rigid3DTransformPointer;
00181 
00182   // Resampler type required in case of a slice by slice transform
00183   typedef btk::ResampleImageByInjectionFilter< ImageType, ImageType
00184                                                >  ResamplerType;
00185 
00186   typedef itk::NormalizedCorrelationImageToImageMetric< ImageType,
00187                                                         ImageType > NCMetricType;
00188 
00189   typedef btk::ImageIntersectionCalculator<ImageType> IntersectionCalculatorType;
00190   IntersectionCalculatorType::Pointer intersectionCalculator = IntersectionCalculatorType::New();
00191 
00192   // Filter setup
00193   unsigned int numberOfImages = input.size();
00194   std::vector< ImagePointer >         images(numberOfImages);
00195   std::vector< ImageMaskPointer >     imageMasks(numberOfImages);
00196 
00197   std::vector< TransformPointer >     transforms(numberOfImages);
00198   std::vector< Rigid3DTransformPointer >     rigid3DTransforms(numberOfImages);
00199 
00200   std::vector< RegistrationPointer >  registration(numberOfImages);
00201   std::vector< Rigid3DRegistrationPointer >  rigid3DRegistration(numberOfImages);
00202 
00203   std::vector< MaskPointer >          masks(numberOfImages);
00204   std::vector< RegionType >           rois(numberOfImages);
00205 
00206   ImagePointer hrImage;
00207   ImagePointer hrImageOld;
00208   ImagePointer hrImageIni;
00209 
00210   lowToHighResFilter -> SetNumberOfImages(numberOfImages);
00211   lowToHighResFilter -> SetTargetImage( 0 );
00212   lowToHighResFilter -> SetMargin( margin );
00213 
00214   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00215   {
00216     // Read and set image
00217 
00218     ImageReaderType::Pointer imageReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00219     imageReader -> SetFileName( input[i].c_str() );
00220     imageReader -> Update();
00221     images[i] = imageReader -> GetOutput();
00222 
00223     lowToHighResFilter -> SetImageArray(i, images[i] );
00224 
00225     if ( boxSwitchArg.isSet() )
00226     {
00227       intersectionCalculator -> AddImage( images[i] );
00228     }
00229 
00230   }
00231 
00232   if ( boxSwitchArg.isSet() )
00233   {
00234     intersectionCalculator -> Compute();
00235   }
00236 
00237   // Set roi according to the provided arguments
00238 
00239   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00240   {
00241 
00242     if ( maskSwitchArg.isSet() )
00243     {
00244       MaskReaderType::Pointer maskReader = MaskReaderType::New();
00245       maskReader -> SetFileName( mask[i].c_str() );
00246       maskReader -> Update();
00247       imageMasks[i] = maskReader -> GetOutput();
00248       lowToHighResFilter -> SetImageMaskArray( i, imageMasks[i] );
00249 
00250       masks[i] = MaskType::New();
00251       masks[i] -> SetImage( imageMasks[i] );
00252       rois[i] = masks[i] -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00253 
00254       lowToHighResFilter -> SetRegionArray( i, rois[i] );
00255 
00256     } else if ( boxSwitchArg.isSet() )
00257       {
00258         imageMasks[i] = intersectionCalculator -> GetImageMask(i);
00259         lowToHighResFilter -> SetImageMaskArray( i, imageMasks[i] );
00260 
00261         masks[i] = MaskType::New();
00262         masks[i] -> SetImage( imageMasks[i] );
00263         rois[i] = masks[i] -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00264         lowToHighResFilter -> SetRegionArray( i, rois[i] );
00265 
00266       } else if ( allSwitchArg.isSet() )
00267         {
00268           rois[i] = images[i] -> GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00269 
00270           lowToHighResFilter -> SetRegionArray( i, rois[i] );
00271         }
00272   }
00273 
00274   // Start registration
00275   try
00276     {
00277     lowToHighResFilter->StartRegistration();
00278     }
00279   catch( itk::ExceptionObject & err )
00280     {
00281     std::cerr << "ExceptionObject caught !" << std::endl;
00282     std::cerr << err << std::endl;
00283     return EXIT_FAILURE;
00284     }
00285 
00286   // Write combined image mask
00287 
00288   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageMaskType >  MaskWriterType;
00289 
00290   if ( strcmp(combinedMask,"") != 0 )
00291   {
00292     MaskWriterType::Pointer maskWriter =  MaskWriterType::New();
00293     maskWriter -> SetFileName( combinedMask );
00294     maskWriter -> SetInput( lowToHighResFilter -> GetImageMaskCombination() );
00295     maskWriter -> Update();
00296   }
00297 
00298   // Write resampled images
00299   if ( resampled.size() > 0 )
00300   {
00301     for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00302     {
00303       lowToHighResFilter -> WriteResampledImages( i, resampled[i].c_str() );
00304     }
00305   }
00306 
00307   // Image registration performed slice by slice or affine 3D according to
00308   // the user selection
00309 
00310   hrImageIni = lowToHighResFilter->GetHighResolutionImage();
00311 
00312   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00313   {
00314     if (rigid3D)
00315     {
00316       rigid3DTransforms[i] = lowToHighResFilter -> GetTransformArray(i);
00317     }else
00318     {
00319       transforms[i] = TransformType::New();
00320       transforms[i] -> SetImage( images[i] );
00321       transforms[i] -> Initialize( lowToHighResFilter -> GetInverseTransformArray(i) );
00322     }
00323   }
00324 
00325   unsigned int im = numberOfImages;
00326   float previousMetric = 0.0;
00327   float currentMetric = 0.0;
00328 
00329   for(unsigned int it=1; it <= itMax; it++)
00330   {
00331     std::cout << "Iteration " << it << std::endl; std::cout.flush();
00332 
00333     // Start registration
00334 
00335     #pragma omp parallel for private(im) schedule(dynamic)
00336 
00337     for (im=0; im<numberOfImages; im++)
00338     {
00339       std::cout << "Registering image " << im << " ... "; std::cout.flush();
00340 
00341       if (rigid3D)
00342       {
00343         rigid3DRegistration[im] = Rigid3DRegistrationType::New();
00344         rigid3DRegistration[im] -> SetFixedImage( images[im] );
00345         rigid3DRegistration[im] -> SetMovingImage( hrImageIni );
00346         rigid3DRegistration[im] -> SetFixedImageMask( imageMasks[im] );
00347         rigid3DRegistration[im] -> SetTransform( rigid3DTransforms[im] );
00348 
00349         try
00350           {
00351           rigid3DRegistration[im] -> StartRegistration();
00352           }
00353         catch( itk::ExceptionObject & err )
00354           {
00355           std::cerr << "ExceptionObject caught !" << std::endl;
00356           std::cerr << err << std::endl;
00357   //        return EXIT_FAILURE;
00358           }
00359 
00360         rigid3DTransforms[im] = rigid3DRegistration[im] -> GetTransform();
00361       } else
00362         {
00363           registration[im] = RegistrationType::New();
00364           registration[im] -> SetFixedImage( images[im] );
00365           registration[im] -> SetMovingImage( hrImageIni );
00366           registration[im] -> SetImageMask( imageMasks[im] );
00367           registration[im] -> SetTransform( transforms[im] );
00368 
00369           try
00370             {
00371             registration[im] -> StartRegistration();
00372             }
00373           catch( itk::ExceptionObject & err )
00374             {
00375             std::cerr << "ExceptionObject caught !" << std::endl;
00376             std::cerr << err << std::endl;
00377     //        return EXIT_FAILURE;
00378             }
00379 
00380           transforms[im] = registration[im] -> GetTransform();
00381         }
00382 
00383       std::cout << "done. "; std::cout.flush();
00384 
00385     }
00386 
00387     std::cout << std::endl; std::cout.flush();
00388 
00389     // Inject images
00390 
00391     std::cout << "Injecting images ... "; std::cout.flush();
00392 
00393 
00394     ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00395 
00396     for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00397     {
00398       resampler -> AddInput( images[i] );
00399       resampler -> AddRegion( rois[i] );
00400 
00401       if (rigid3D)
00402       {
00403         transforms[i] = TransformType::New();
00404         transforms[i] -> SetImage( images[i] );
00405         transforms[i] -> Initialize( rigid3DTransforms[i] );
00406       }
00407 
00408       resampler -> SetTransform(i, transforms[i]) ;
00409     }
00410 
00411     resampler -> UseReferenceImageOn();
00412     resampler -> SetReferenceImage( hrImageIni );
00413     resampler -> SetImageMask(lowToHighResFilter -> GetImageMaskCombination());
00414     resampler -> Update();
00415 
00416     if (it == 1)
00417       hrImageOld = hrImageIni;
00418     else
00419       hrImageOld = hrImage;
00420 
00421     hrImage = resampler -> GetOutput();
00422 
00423 
00424     std::cout << "done. " << std::endl; std::cout.flush();
00425 
00426     // compute error
00427 
00428     typedef itk::MinimumMaximumImageCalculator<ImageType> CalculatorType;
00429 
00430     CalculatorType::Pointer calculatorA = CalculatorType::New();
00431     calculatorA -> SetImage( hrImageOld );
00432     calculatorA -> ComputeMaximum();
00433 
00434     typedef itk::DivideByConstantImageFilter<ImageType, float, ImageType> NormalizerType;
00435 
00436     NormalizerType::Pointer normalizerA = NormalizerType::New();
00437     normalizerA -> SetInput( hrImageOld );
00438     normalizerA -> SetConstant( calculatorA -> GetMaximum() );
00439     normalizerA -> Update();
00440 
00441     NormalizerType::Pointer normalizerB = NormalizerType::New();
00442     normalizerB -> SetInput( hrImage );
00443     normalizerB -> SetConstant( calculatorA -> GetMaximum() );
00444     normalizerB -> Update();
00445 
00446     ImagePointer imageA = normalizerA -> GetOutput();
00447     ImagePointer imageB = normalizerB -> GetOutput();
00448 
00449     typedef itk::Euler3DTransform< double > EulerTransformType;
00450     EulerTransformType::Pointer identity = EulerTransformType::New();
00451     identity -> SetIdentity();
00452 
00453     typedef itk::LinearInterpolateImageFunction<
00454                                       ImageType,
00455                                       double>     InterpolatorType;
00456     InterpolatorType::Pointer interpolator = InterpolatorType::New();
00457 
00458     NCMetricType::Pointer nc = NCMetricType::New();
00459     nc -> SetFixedImage(  imageA );
00460     nc -> SetMovingImage( imageB );
00461     nc -> SetFixedImageRegion( imageA -> GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
00462     nc -> SetTransform( identity );
00463     nc -> SetInterpolator( interpolator );
00464     nc -> Initialize();
00465 
00466     previousMetric = currentMetric;
00467     currentMetric = - nc -> GetValue( identity -> GetParameters() );
00468 
00469     double delta = 0.0;
00470 
00471     if (it >= 2)
00472       delta = (currentMetric - previousMetric) / previousMetric;
00473     else
00474       delta = 1;
00475 
00476     if (delta < epsilon) break;
00477 
00478   }
00479 
00480 
00481   // Write HR image
00482 
00483   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >  WriterType;
00484 
00485   WriterType::Pointer writer =  WriterType::New();
00486   writer-> SetFileName( outImage );
00487   writer-> SetInput( hrImage );
00488   writer-> Update();
00489 
00490 
00491   // Write transforms
00492 
00493   typedef itk::TransformFileWriter TransformWriterType;
00494 
00495   if ( transform.size() > 0 )
00496   {
00497     for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00498     {
00499       TransformWriterType::Pointer transformWriter = TransformWriterType::New();
00500 
00501       if (rigid3D)
00502       {
00503         transformWriter -> SetInput( rigid3DTransforms[i] );
00504       } else
00505         {
00506           transformWriter -> SetInput( transforms[i] );
00507         }
00508 
00509       transformWriter -> SetFileName ( transform[i].c_str() );
00510 
00511 
00512       try
00513       {
00514         std::cout << "Writing " << transform[i].c_str() << " ... " ; std::cout.flush();
00515         transformWriter -> Update();
00516         std::cout << " done! " << std::endl;
00517       }
00518       catch ( itk::ExceptionObject & excp )
00519       {
00520         std::cerr << "Error while saving transform" << std::endl;
00521         std::cerr << excp << std::endl;
00522         std::cout << "[FAILED]" << std::endl;
00523         throw excp;
00524       }
00525 
00526     }
00527   }
00528 
00529   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00530 
00531   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00532   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00533 }
